sqlMap.sql: SELECT PBLANC_BOARD_CODE ,PBLANC_BOARD_TITLE ,PBLANC_BOARD_COM ,PBLANC_BOARD_COM_DATE ,PBLANC_BOARD_LINK ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(PBLANC_BOARD_BUDGET,'L9,999,999,999,999')) AS PBLANC_BOARD_BUDGET ,PBLANC_BOARD_END_PROPOSAL ,PBLANC_BOARD_DELETE ,EMP_CODE ,PBLANC_BOARD_HIT FROM PBLANC_BOARD WHERE PBLANC_BOARD_DELETE = 'n'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (
ORDER BY PBLANC_BOARD_CODE) A ) B
WHERE B.RNUM <= #startCount# AND B.RNUM >= #endCount#
ORDER BY B.RNUM DESC

SELECT A.PBLANC_BOARD_CODE ,A.PBLANC_BOARD_TITLE ,A.PBLANC_BOARD_COM ,TO_CHAR(PBLANC_BOARD_COM_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PBLANC_BOARD_COM_DATE ,A.PBLANC_BOARD_LINK ,A.PBLANC_BOARD_BUDGET ,TO_CHAR(PBLANC_BOARD_END_PROPOSAL, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PBLANC_BOARD_END_PROPOSAL ,A.PBLANC_BOARD_END_PROPOSAL ,B.EMP_NAME AS EMP_CODE FROM PBLANC_BOARD A, EMP B WHERE A.EMP_CODE = B.EMP_CODE AND PBLANC_BOARD_CODE = #pblanc_board_code#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT PBLANC_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PBLANC_BOARD( PBLANC_BOARD_CODE ,PBLANC_BOARD_TITLE ,PBLANC_BOARD_COM ,PBLANC_BOARD_COM_DATE ,PBLANC_BOARD_LINK ,PBLANC_BOARD_BUDGET ,PBLANC_BOARD_END_PROPOSAL ,EMP_CODE ) values( #pblanc_board_code# ,#pblanc_board_title# ,#pblanc_board_com# ,#pblanc_board_com_date# ,#pblanc_board_link# ,#pblanc_board_budget# ,#pblanc_board_end_proposal# ,#emp_code# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PBLANC_BOARD SET PBLANC_BOARD_TITLE = #pblanc_board_title# ,PBLANC_BOARD_COM = #pblanc_board_com# ,PBLANC_BOARD_COM_DATE = #pblanc_board_com_date# ,PBLANC_BOARD_LINK = #pblanc_board_link# ,PBLANC_BOARD_BUDGET = #pblanc_board_budget# ,PBLANC_BOARD_END_PROPOSAL = #pblanc_board_end_proposal# WHERE PBLANC_BOARD_CODE = #pblanc_board_code#
UPDATE PBLANC_BOARD SET PBLANC_BOARD_DELETE = 'y' WHERE PBLANC_BOARD_CODE = #pblanc_board_code#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(PBLANC_BOARD_CODE) FROM PBLANC_BOARD WHERE PBLANC_BOARD_DELETE = 'n'
